title: I participate and select a bracket in worlds pick em but didn't get an icon
body: So, I rearranged the teams I thought were going to win in worlds pick em but I didn't get a reward. I searched online if maybe your only supposed to get it at the end of worlds, it said your supposed to get it instantly! I really wanted the participation icon and I'm frustrated a bug (or something idk) stopped me :/

replies.body:
These icons are being distributed throughout October in a few waves, and as our [Worlds Pick'em 2016 FAQ states](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/205613524-2016-Worlds-Pick-em), the end date for distribution is on Nov. 4th. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

Never mind, I forgot to delete this post XD. I already got the icon now. 

Also, can you help me with my latest post? I'm having issues with league of legends gift cards.
